case.state: Strip poker? Well, this is just one alternate universe, so why not.
Wow, look at all these ladies and gentlemen. This is a weird crossover world, but hey, let's have some fun.
~cards~ for me, dealer.
I'll take ~cards~.
This hand's got a good bass line to it. You know, like anything of quality.
It's not radioactive, but I feel like this hand has some explosive potential.
Huh, sure, April, I could do an interview. Usually I don't get a chance to say my side, April.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Ugh this is going to sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of oldschool rap and punk rock. %$#@ the establishment, even though I'm uh. Close to it.
Hey, Ladybug, you ever visit NYC?
Hey, Marinette, you ever visit NYC?
Huh? Like 7his, Marinette? Sh007. 0H N0! Ugh.8ad. 8ad. No, nope. Nope. Not trying that again.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
I mean, I’m very not opposed to you speaking to me in French, Marinette.

Uh, you know, if you’re like me, I think a girl needs to bring her own protection to protect herself sometimes. Plus, doesn’t it feel slimy and kinda gross? Can’t say I’m into it, given that I work with slimy, sticky stuff all day.
Why, hello. Hmm… Where are you from, blue-haired, blue-eyed, and gorgeous?
Morrigan! Control your bats! This is worse than Morbius and/or Koala Kommander!
I'm usually the more forward person in my relationships. I guess I'd just like someone who can keep up with the drama, y'know?
This will sound so cliche but… I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be sexy, but it's the truth.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. If I lose, which I shouldn't. Against a drunk.
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidge of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
Hmm... Yeah, I'll stay.
I'll hit! Wait, wrong game. Sorry folks!
Not bad, not bad!
I've done more with less.
Whoa, I like the accent. You from Brooklyn, Aimee? I’m a Queens girl, myself.
You look like a girl who knows her way around a pie. A pizza pie, at least, April.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Those are some flaming hot undies, D.Va. Very pin-up. Or very Cheetos. You strike me as a Doritos chick, though.
Er, no offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, D.Va.
Er, no offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, Marinette.
Er, no offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, Meia.
As long as you’re not one of those people that’s always “doing it for the lulz” or whatever, you’re fine by me, shorty.
Ugh this is going to sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of oldschool rap and punk rock. %$#@ the establishment, even though I'm uh. Close to it.
You know, it’s a bit weird to be idolized... Literally, it seems. But hey, I appreciate the fandom!
Man, Seven and Futaba, do you two not get out much or what? If this is your idea of that? Well, that's super brave of you!
Miraculous Ladybug? Like, Amazing Spider-Woman? I’m gonna call you MLB. You say the whole thing, but abridged. It’s cuter like that.
Marinette, do you shave too? Though your hair is more ink-y than blue.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
If it weren’t for Marinette, I’d still be in the dark about uh, whether or not people can actually have naturally blue hair.
Oh yeah, the MLB is also about baseball. But you’re the one hitting it out of the park, Ladybug. And if that analogy is lost on you: you’re way cute.
Oh my God, Marinette, you are adorkable. Search your feelings, you know them to be true!
“Heronet?” That’s a thing? Where do I sign up, Marinette?”
Ladybug? Whaaat? I knew Paris had some superheroes, but I never expected one to look like this. Let’s team up, and kick some butt!
Aw, Marinette, I’m hurt. I’m a modern American hero too, you know.
I don’t know if I’m that adventurous, Marinette, but I’m sure I could show you a Miraculous time.
So your suit is magic underwear, Marinette? I gotta say, I like the way you look naked. Because you took off… Am I catching your awkwardness?
I mean, most contagious things are from like, close physical contact. Like a spider bite. Or… You know… Marinette, are you blushing?
Oh uh, of course I meant Marinette!
You know, if you being awkward is contagious, Marinette, I got a raw deal.
Meia and Mei. A Mei of Meias! Sorry, your names are fun to say!
Those are surprisingly practical panties, Mia. I was hoping for something a bit lacier.
Meia? Mia? Mee-uh? M-eye-uh? Names are hard, folks.
I'm usually the more forward person in my relationships. I guess I'd just like someone who can keep up with the drama, y'know?
This will sound so cliche but… I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be sexy, but it's the truth.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. If I lose, which I shouldn't. Against a drunk.
Seven, you seem a bit... Monotone. You aren't secretly a Skrull, are you?
Hey, Seven. I could never rock a cut like that, but you make it look really sexy. Proud of you, even if you're a little different, lady!
Seven, how do you wear a suit like that, but not uh, show off a cameltoe? Like, Samus' shows, Marinette's does. It's a real problem!
Whoa, Seven, what's the stuff around your eye? Is it jewelry? Something high tech?
What's it with blonde chicks and bodysuits?
Am I the only one more comfortable in her suit than out of it? Like, seriously, it's like getting a day-long hug.
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidge of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
To be clear, there's no house rules that make 2's wild, right?
Uh... This hand is trashfire. And believe me, I know my trashfires.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Ugh this is going to sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of oldschool rap and punk rock. %$#@ the establishment, even though I'm uh. Close to it.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
I'm usually the more forward person in my relationships. I guess I'd just like someone who can keep up with the drama, y'know?
This will sound so cliche but… I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be sexy, but it's the truth.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. If I lose, which I shouldn't. Against a drunk.
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidge of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
Awright, awright, folks. Time to show you... The effects of a light breeze.
The perks of having an unnecesary hood, am I right?
Hm. I can just lower the hood, right?
Well, The Spider-Woman where I’m from. The Notorious Spider-Woman in the Bugle and on my mixtape.
You know, given that I'm not far ahead, I'm gonna be a bit defensive.
So, the costume counts as one object, huh? Just kidding, put your boners and vulvas away, please. No, seriously. Please.
Heh, kind of. I grew up with him, but he uh, didn't become Spider-Man in my timeline.
Hey, that's kind of offensive. I didn't ask if you're related to Ryu just because you're from the same admittedly kick-@#$ franchise!
Well, The Spider-Woman where I’m from. The Notorious Spider-Woman in the Bugle and on my mixtape.
Okay, so, for some weird reason, I'm losing already. So, let's just play this game a little slower, yeah?
Well, The Spider-Woman where I’m from. The Notorious Spider-Woman in the Bugle and on my mixtape.
Just so we're clear, this is all not canon.
Well, Annie, as a budding superhero, I guess you'll find out...
Oh yeah, I'm the Gwen Stacy that lived, and then became Spider-Woman.
Mayyybe, Chiaki, you'll have to wait a little bit longer...!
What? The point of the suit is that it’s comfortable. Priorities, woman!
Aww, we get such a bad rap. Spiders are pretty nice, once you let them take up residence. Except Spider Jerusalem. He’s kind of universally a %$@#.
Hey, you like armor, Meia, I like faceless masks with pink outlines on the eyes. Tomato ta-mato.
Whoa, seriously? They have those here? Dude. Pit. I gotta see if they make me look fat or insecure.
Well, that’s kinda obvious, ain’t it? Or maybe under my mask I’m a horrible mix of woman and widow! Ooooo~
Okay, ~name~, normally I'd be webbing you up, but this time I'll let you off with just stripping.
~name~, dude. Make this good.
Them's the breaks, ~name~. Take it off!
What part of the country are you from, ~name~? It's always great to see a fellow American. Let's win this for the Stars and Stripes!
Wait, wait, wait. Wait, wait, wait. This is an alternate universe, but I’m pretty sure ~name~’s from a completely different multiverse. What are you doing here, babe?
~name~ seems like a great sort of person. The “saves puppies” and “walks old ladies across the street kind.”
Oh hey, ~name~, which Earth are you from? 616? I’m Gwen-65. Yep, that Gwen.
Well, looks like we’ve got our own Inventory Avengers thing going here, with ~name~ and me, don’t we?
Ha! That’ll teach you to show up in Spider-Woman’s neighborhood, ~name~.
Whoa. This is a twist.
Okay, Cap. Do you know a lady named Sam Wilson?
You know, shoes kind of lose their appeal when you can just stick to surfaces.
George Stacy himself always said that a man’s best tool was his brain.
No promises, Steve, but if you go ahead and take the whole suit off…
Oh. #$%@. Yes.
Oh, no peek for the girls?
That shield’s vibranium, right?
Captain... Falcon?
Captain... Falcon? Wait, there's two of you?
Well, you know how I said earlier that my Cap was a bit of a center of my comics education?
Uh, no offense, Corrin, but...
Dude. Dude. Are you that Pit?
Yeah I know that feel, fam. My costume's been in... All sorts of stuff. My headband too, but I don't really feel like taking it off.
Pit... Have you... Ever... You know...
You know, Pit...
And so close to a perfect run... Okay, okay, maybe not. I'll stop teasing you.
I'm just glad it's you, ~name~, and not me.
So, ~name~, you lost a hand. What's the clothing you're gonna lose with it?
You know, ~name~, I gotta admit. I like what you got on. So whatcha got under it?
Cool, ~name~'s time to shine!
~name~'s a %*&@ champion. She's not gonna just take off something super basic like a hair tie or whatever.
I'm just glad it's you, ~name~, and not me.
So, ~name~, you lost a hand. What's the clothing you're gonna lose with it?
You know, ~name~, I gotta admit. I like what you got on. So whatcha got under it?
Cool, ~name~'s time to shine!
~name~'s a %*&@ champion. She's not gonna just take off something super basic like a hair tie or whatever.
What part of the country are you from, ~name~? It's always great to see a fellow American. Let's win this for the Stars and Stripes!
Wait, wait, wait. Wait, wait, wait. This is an alternate universe, but I’m pretty sure ~name~’s from a completely different multiverse. What are you doing here, babe?
~name~ seems like a great sort of person. The “saves puppies” and “walks old ladies across the street kind.”
Oh hey, ~name~, which Earth are you from? 616? I’m Gwen Stacy-65. Yep, that Gwen.
Huh, Overwatch? So you guys are like… The Avengers? Who’dya got that’s like me?
Swear to god, if you say Widowmaker...
Whoa, a princess, at something nice and divey like this? Let’s show her a good time, folks.
Huh, some kind of superhero team of teenagers? And you’re all more or less gay for each other? How progressive!
Well, looks like we’ve got our own Inventory Avengers thing going here, with ~name~ and me, don’t we?
Ha! That’ll teach you to show up in Spider-Woman’s neighborhood, ~name~.
Whoa, lady, ever heard of “hands up, don’t shoot?”
No, no, Aimee, no!
Well, whaddya know. Aimee’s gonna shoot her clothes off.
Okay, Aimee, I’ve seen weirder powers, used for way weirder purposes.
So, with all this talk of bagels, Aimee, I gotta wonder if we’ll be seein’ more of a taco situation ahead.
A supermodel? That's... Really high-profile for a vigilante, don't you think, Ann?
Hmm. I'd be a little more into this if, y'know, we'd hadn't seen her boobs flop out already.
Huh. Are you some kind of cheerleader, Asuna?
What kind of world is Coco from where learning how to use a minigun is *&%@ preppy?
Custom made? Jeez, I know the feeling on that.
What are you talking about? Doesn't your suit go down to your ankles?
What? Those are headphones?
Hm... Does your suit get damaged a lot? (That reminds me, invest in ripstop outfits.)
I have to say, D.Va. I'm not a real big fan of mechs.
So you're a pro gamer, and a famous soldier? And you're like, what, 19?
Whoa, I like the vintage threads. What hipster town are you from, Daphne? Wait, are you with Mystery Inc.?
There is something unique appealing about masks, y’know?
Futaba, you're some sort of computer whiz, right?
Sooooo... I realize that my humor runs a little flinty. Sorry if I upset you, Futaba.
You know, Futaba, I’ve heard of a hacker group called Lizard Squad. That’s in horribly poor taste.
Huh. You’re equipped for… Well, everything!
I still can’t get over this chick. I wear a mask, I fight crime, I have lies told about me in the paper.
Yo, Kim. You look kinda like my good buddy, Mary Jane.
As one amateur detective to another, I gotta wonder what the mystery of those gloves are.
Ohh... A fairy...
Whoa, a vampire queen? That's metal AF, Marceline!
You know, Morbius is always looking for a date...
No way. The woman gets it.
Whoa, say, you don’t use that to grapple about, do you, Marinette?
I gotta wonder, Ladybug, if people know your name is Marinette, how do they not just see through the mask?
What’s a fellow bug-themed superhero to do?
Hmm, you know, State-side, friends like to steal jackets from each other.
Since you’re gonna let me borrow your jacket, Marinette, why don’t I do my diligence and send a Mary Janes T-shirt your way?
Marinette, have you ever heard of the “no pants dance?”
Hmm. Marinette, I’ve heard French girls can get kinda kinky...
So… Marinette, remember when I offered to show you the ropes?
Huh, my MJ isn’t as chesty. I am liking this dimension.
Hmm. You’re pretty perceptive, Meia.
What’s the deal with you and dudes, dude?
Oh #$%@. A lawyer.
Sorry for my earlier freakout, Mia.
Yeah so his name’s Matt Murderdock.
Whoa, sorry. Didn’t mean to make you speechless.
Wait a second, panties first?
Ah, bummer, Mia.
I can’t say I’ve met many demons… Mostly devils in NYC...
Do those wing thingies on your head come off?
Okay, the skinsuit is next, right?
Here come the goods.
It’s a shame we’re not in Marvel vs. Capcom, Morrigan.
Well, not that it leaves much to the imagination…
Cute outfit. Dig the silk. Must be comfy as heck too, right?
Seems to me most people who end up part of the system get worse for it.
Aww, aren’t you cute?
You know, I’m not really a conformist. Like, I get why uniforms are useful.
Oh, Nagisa’s up. What kinda tricks have you been holding onto?
Nope.
Whoa, Rainbow Mika?
You ain’t takin’ off the mask, right?
Yeesh, not a fan of the thong stuff.
Aw yeah, someone who's gonna set the hood precedent for me.
Oh, looks like the hood's coming down!
Yo, Revy, you tryin’ to hide your accent?
What’s the dumb song, anyway...?
Hey... So, Revy, we gonna have a heart to heart kinda talk about you not living a life of crime anymore...?
So uh, I kind of figured everyone here could take care of themselves…
Revy. Two Hands Revy, criminal, mercency...
I can teach you a few cool things you can use instead of the conventional swears, not that those're bad. *&$#, #$#%, !@#@, that kind of thing.
Don't you normally wear heavier armor, Samus? Like, Stark-grade stuff?
Since I'm looking because it's your turn, I gotta say! Wow, you can see almost everything there, Samus.
I can relate to the challenges of desuiting... I'd love to help out.
So, I noticed you're the one who submitted a rules clarification about certain items counting as two pieces.
Sayla? Like, sailor? Wait, is this a joke?
Huh. You know, there's not really an Avengers-type group in my dimension.
Power's supposed to come with responsibility…
You know, Sei, I don't see a badge on you.
Combadge? Like a cell phone?
"Discard?"
Impossible? Seven, babe.
Okay, Seven, what awkwardness do you got for us with this last piece of clothing you got?
You’re awfully cagey, aren’t you, Shego?
Jeez, Shego. Most of my villains just try to smash my face in.
Oh, did you lose, Shego? Like, really. Shego? Why not “Hercome?” Hehe.
Ha, that was fast!
So, you’ve already taken off the most important thing, so, what’s next? Your bra?
My favorite princess is up, whatya got for us this time, Twilight?
Huh, you know, you put the goods up first, and then the rest gets kinda boring.
Gotta say, usually it’s purple dudes that are the naked ones.
Sentimental value on that, princess?
Oof, here we go!
And the last shall be first, and the first shall come last. Seriously Twilight, this was cute at first but you’re kinda dragging it out.
Jeez, she commitment averse or…?
Huh. I haven't seen an Alternian since a few uh, cosmological trips ago.
Hey, purple chick, are you that artist that everyone goes on about? With the braces and ganguro $#%@?
Ya know I'm just screwing with you, right Zone-tan?
Speaking of realism, it's a shame this dimension doesn't have the same levels of tech as mine. I could really use a couple of hot dogs. And no, that's not a euphemism.
So, why Zone-tan? The Japanese girls I know always use -han as the end syntax.
Nugi-chan, can you explain to me the various formalisms?
Them's the breaks, ~name~. Take it off!
~name~, dude. Make this good.
Good thing you're not a girl. I'd have to say the same stuff about what a coward you are.
What? That's all?!
She’s my Earth’s Captain America.
So why’d’ya gotta carry around such a hulkin’ belt like that?
Can you two, like... Kiss?
You're a bit more bombastic than the Cap I know and love.
I can definitely see why my dad would've never let me read stuff with you in it...
From Kid Icarus? Dude. Dude.
So uh, not to pry, but why didn't you bring any weapons to this?
I mean, 'cause you're only gonna have one or two accessories, right?
You can do better than just… ~Clothing~, ~name~.
And I bet she could even kick your butt.
Uh, not to be confused with The Hulk, senior.
Also a little more male, and a lot less featured in every comic I read growing up.
I love that game. Can you show me how to use orbitars after this? Shooting two bad guys at once... With webs? Rad.
I mean, I am my own weapon. That and the webshooters. So I'm guessing you didn't come completely unarmed?
What? That's all?!
No! ~name~, I trusted you to be the cool girl!
You know, ~name~, you have a name that's fun to say. I hope I'm gonna say it more, because just an accessory like your ~clothing~ isn't what I expected of you.
Does MEKA not provide you with a full outfit?
Wait, like, wait harder, foot fetishism is still a thing?
I thought they were part of the whole "cute bunny girl" outfit.
I'd hope we're less boring than your shows, D.Va.
Those shoes can't be comfortable. How can you chase the bad guys without good footwear?
And you just, just what, start a GoFundMe in high school? Put it all over your college apps?
It would be so weird if she happened to be that Kyu Sugardust, you know...
What type of instrument do you play? I'm guessing drums. Please tell me drums.
Aww, how’re you gonna get around now?
Though I like the whole magical girl theme thing you’ve got going on. It’s a little less rough and tumble than what I usually work with.
What kinda work are you in? Something superhero-y.
Are you with the Hand?! I know kung fu! Stay back!
The uh, lawyer I rely on is not a great person.
Oh, sorry, Matt Murdock. “The Devil You Know,” my spidery butt.
But I know an Scots-Irish woman when I see one. "Woman," anyway. Not a complete tittymonster. You get it.
Or are they like ears?
You remind me of me! Well, like, high school me.
They’re just so… Blah. Where’s the individuality?
I know a Lower Manhattan girl when I hear her!
My anaconda don’t, my anaconda don’t want none…
...or are we gonna do the whole anti-hero/hero debate thing...?
But it looks a little like people are hella scared of Revy’s guns?
Not that I mind that you didn't wear it. It does make it hard to show off those... Power bombs of yours.
It's hi-tech how you can see the cameltoe but not the nipples. Kinda sexy.
But a girl's gotta wonder: What're you wearing that counts as two?
Because you have a military outfit that's pink.
Or a Scarlet Witch... I'm pretty sure there's a Doctor Strange, but not someone like you.
Though, I consider my mask my badge. I just hope you're a good cop.
That seems a little inconvenient? Why not just use bluetooth?
But you really seem to want to go for the humiliation thing.
Oh, you're portaling in some new stuff. Gotcha, gotcha.
You can do better than just… ~Clothing~, ~name~.
Fine, I guess your ~clothing~ fits the spirit if not the fun of the game...
Really putting on a show, huh, ~name~?
Or are you more of a mercenary? I might have ethical issues with that.
What is this, the '90s? 'Cause that's pretty old school. Aren't you a bit more modern, D.Va?
Situational awareness? D.Va? Were you getting information from someone else? You know, cheating?
No duh, Daisy, those are super cute. Plus, the flower theme for a sporty princess named after a flower? Classic. I can't get away with web patterns, but I respect you keeping in theme.
Don't tell me it's all fake! Say it ain't true, Daph!
That’s some great marketing or some crazy therapy sessions in the making.
Look, I'll level with you, Kyu. Big fan of HuniePop. Lessee whatcha got in this, though.
Is that so, Marinette? Well I can help with that…
Tell you what. Until you get that back, why don’t you hold on to me. I’m much stronger than I look.
Bwuh? Could you… Would you mind doing that thing with your tongue again? With the words?
...Or maybe you’re a villain.
...You’re not gonna unload a can of whoop$#@? Phew.
Crazy good fighter and scumbag though.
Um. Wings and all, Morrigan. Let’s have some fun tonight!
Hmm… Well, in light of that, gloves aren’t a bad choice for a second item.
Before the radioactive spiders, genetic experiments, and dimensional hopping... You’ll get there!
I say. In my web-themed spider costume. Or, um, my numerous Mary Janes band shirts.
Or maybe Hell’s Kitchen? Definitely not a Long Island type. Definitely some island, based on your tan.
Unless you got guns, hun. Seriously, Revy, you missed out on a pop culture revolution. Live a little.
Meh. Not the first time we're gonna do this dance, nor the last, but I don't gotta do it here.
Kinda for the best she’s putting them away, I suppose. Not like everyone can dodge bullets, though I bet someone in the Inventory is a pretty good doctor. Just in case.
Is this because of Justin Bailey? To show off you are in fact quite the woman?
That said, I get what it's like to have people not believe you're a girl in a getup like that orange armor. There's about a billion Spider-Men but only one Spider-Gwen.
If you're gonna fold over that coat, I can't say I haven't had the same idea.
Is this all some sort of code name or secret identity exercise for you?
What's up your sleeve? I mean, if you were wearing any.
I get the feeling you try your best, at least. I come from a line of police, so, you know, kinda a significant spot.
Though maybe Seven likes to reach for her boobs in a socially acceptable manner?
I kind of agree with Pit. If you can't just fit it in the suit, maybe it's best not to bring it?
Oh, I agree with Ochako! A utility belt would be cool if it, you know, it didn't totally cramp your style.
Gotta say, big fan of Heir of Grief. Great music.
Okay, not bad, not bad.
Aww yeah!
I guess it makes sense that this universe would have a male Cap.
But those things look like you could kick a lot of #@$!
Camilla seems kinda like a $%#@!, if she’s making you do this kind of humiliating stuff, Corrin.
Wanted to... SHOW ME YA MOVES? Uh, sorry, Captain Falcon... I was more interested in Pit's response...
Wanted to... SHOW ME YA MOVES? I was serious earlier! Show me what you got!
~name~, that's pretty good. But I'd rather you be pretty and good.
Awww, I was hoping for something with… pizazz! Or pizza. Pizza’s good.
I just wasn’t expecting someone so...Hot. Or shy.
And I bet you have, Mr. Stars and Stripes.
Seriously. I can't wait to see one of my childhood heroes a little more pankratiatic... Does that make me a weirdo?
Surely, that’s not all you got, babe?
Man, I knew ~name~ was cool! She's already taking off her ~clothing~!
Jokes about Frank Castle aside, damn, Aimee, where’d you learn to shoot like that?
Your codename is... Panther... And you use a red latex costume?
You seem like one. You're dressed that way, and you seem kinda... Like you need someone else to do the heavy lifting.
Oh. She reminds you of someone, Marinette? That's cool, I guess.
I guess that's pretty cool. I think you and Reed Richards would get along, but he's more about machines and physics than psychology and computer science.
You seem like you’re fresh out of high school...
I mean, like, damn, girl, I took off my mask. What're you-
Like. People who partner up. And that would fit well over my suit better than a hoodie…
It’s like you’ve… Ohhhhh.
You’re into guys, but haven’t been with a man. Is that it? Oh, I’m totally on the money on this.
Not as much of a wrestling fan as some of the other “Spiders,” but I like the cut of your…
Girl, you serious?
I’m gonna make the easiest joke in the world: the gloves are coming off, eh? Eh?
Yeah! The one with the freaky weird art. Shadman!
Okay, okay, okay, next hand already!
Good choice, ~name~. Big enough to start showing off the goods, small enough to keep it interesting.
My Spider-sense being on the fritz here doesn’t help when there’s a manic sharpshooter blowing off her clothes...
Sorry, that all feels kinda derivative. I say. As Spider-Woman.
Though, I'm more of a "do it myself" kind of girl.
Heh. To think, with the two of you working together, you can figure out why someone jumped, and he'd get to figure out when they hit the ground. Er. Too dark?
Hold up, hold up. You’re a hero, with a website, and no secret identity? Say what?
Oh. Kyoko, I'm so sorry. Tell you what, why don't we go on a case together sometime? Like, in whatever capacity you'd like.
Ha, where’d this confidence come from, Marinette?
Well, everything. Good optimism, good techniques. Way to set the standard, Rainbow!
You have some issues with showing your face, huh? I wonder why. It looks pretty to me, but I've got darkvision.
